title: PHPdate_get_last_errors()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPdate_get_last_errors()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return the warnings and errors while parsing a date string:
<?php
date_create("gyuiyiuyui%&&/");
print_r(date_get_last_errors());
?>

Definition and Usage
The date_get_last_errors() function returns the warnings/errors found while parsing a date string.
Syntax
date_get_last_errors()
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns an array that contains information about the errors/warnings
PHP Version:
5.3+

★
+1
